lines.text: Don't know any generals. To me you look like clowns!
Of ten men nine are dirty! You have dirty language, and dirty minds. I am an artist. I worship beauty. I will destroy everything that is imperfect in my eyes, bit by bit and slowly.
The Nice People are always the first to die. Do I look like a nice person.

[to Grease Lightning]
I can destroy your past records but you have to do something for me.
Nevermind one thing I will do 100 things if you can do that

[after the real killer beats up the fake killer for pretending to be him in the wrestling match]
What.Have you no shame of moral?,I hate you,Goodbye
When the tree falls, the monkey runs.
